/**
 * Hashes the model's password and saves it to the database.
 * @function
 * @param {any} model - The usermodel that should be saved.
 */
let hashPwAndSave = function (model) {
    scrypt.kdf(model.password, params, (err, hash) => {
        model.password = hash.toString("hex");
        model.save((err, user) => {
            if (err)
                return console.error(err);
            console.log(`Saved user ${model.username}`);
        });
    });
};
exports.hashPwAndSave = hashPwAndSave;
/**
 * Generates a random, 10 character long, user id.
 * @function
 * @returns The user id.
 */
let generateUserId = function () {
    return crypto
        .randomBytes(Math.ceil(10 * 3 / 4))
        .toString("base64")
        .slice(0, 10)
        .replace(/\+/g, "3")
        .replace(/\//g, "x");
};
exports.generateUserId = generateUserId;
